functions.name: run_scene
functions.description: Activate a preconfigured smart home scene mapped to an IFTTT event as part of the AeroVolt HomeFlow plug-in for Project G-Assist.

scene.description: Name of the scene to run, e.g. 'study', 'sleep', 'movie', 'away'.

functions.name: trigger_ifttt_event
functions.description: Trigger a raw IFTTT Webhooks event with optional values for advanced automations.

event_name.description: The IFTTT Webhooks event name, e.g. 'aerovolt_lights_off'.

value1.description: Optional value1 payload passed to IFTTT.

value2.description: Optional value2 payload passed to IFTTT.

value3.description: Optional value3 payload passed to IFTTT.

functions.name: list_scenes
functions.description: List all configured smart home scenes that AeroVolt HomeFlow can run.

functions.name: run_mobility_action
functions.description: Run an AeroVolt HomeFlow mobility action for EVs or UAVs, such as starting EV charging or launching a UAV patrol.

functions.name: list_mobility_actions
functions.description: List all configured mobility actions for EVs and UAVs that AeroVolt HomeFlow can run.
